body:
The `spack location -i` command, which works fine without an environment, suddenly stops working when an environment is involved.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```
$ alias spack
alias spack='spack -e otp-dev-mac'
$ spack location -i maven   # Try with environment
/Users/citibob/spack/otp/var/spack/environments/otp-dev-mac
$ \spack location -i maven   # Try without environment
/Users/citibob/spack/otp/opt/spack/darwin-highsierra-x86_64/clang-9.0.0-apple/maven-3.5.0-nfxa7a5xs2h3yjjru7muprrgu5u7sonc
```
title: `spack location -i` doesn't work with Environments
